alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Showers producing gusty outflow winds will impact portions of north central Salt Lake...southeastern Davis and southwestern Morgan Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 712 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower producing gusty outflow winds over North Salt Lake, or over Bountiful, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust will limit visibility. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Bountiful, Farmington, Kaysville, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful, Salt Lake City International Airport, Fruit Heights and University Of Utah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 307 and 328. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 112 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
